paper_abstract: Let K be a number field and F(X, Y) an absolutely irreducible polynomial of K[X, Y] such that the algebraic curve defined by the equation F(X,Y) = 0 is rational. In this paper we present practical algorithms for the determination of all solutions of the Diophantine equation F(X,Y) = 0 in algebraic integers of K. (C) 2010 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Solving genus zero Diophantine equations over number fields
